title: Elevates severity of patronizing a prostitute and permitting prostitution, and makes certain provisions of promoting prostitution violent felonies
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to promoting prostitution, patronizing a prostitute and permitting prostitution; and to amend the correction law, in relation to designating permitting prostitution in the first degree as a sex offense for the purposes of the sex offender registration act
